sqlMap.select:
SELECT GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD || "-" || GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM , GAM_GETCODENAME("GAM013", GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_SE_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , GAM_GETCODENAME("GAM001", GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_NM , GAM_GETCODENAME("GAM002", GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM , GAM_GETCODENAME("GAM003", GAC.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD) GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC || " " || GIS_ASSETS_LNM || DECODE(NVL(GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, ""), "", "", "-") || NVL(GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, "") GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR
, GAC.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR , GAC.DRW_LST_DRW_LST_SEQ
, GAP.PHOTO_SEQ , GAP.PHOTO_SJ , GAP.FILENM_PHYSICL , GAP.FILENM_LOGIC , GAP.SHOT_DT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC LEFT JOIN GIS_ASSET_PHOTO_F GAP ON GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = GAP.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD=GAP.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=GAP.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1 = 1
GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetPrtAtCode#
GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetCd#
GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetSubCd#

SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME("GAM019", AR.PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_NM ,AR.MNG_YEAR || "-" || AR.MNG_NO || "-" || AR.MNG_CNT MNG_NUMBER ,AR.ENTRPSCD ,GAM_GETENTRPSNM(AR.ENTRPSCD, '1') ENTRPSNM ,TO_CHAR(AR.REQST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQST_DT ,TO_CHAR(AR.FRST_REQST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REQST_DT ,AR.GR_AR ,AR.GR_FEE ,AR.GR_RDCXPT_FEE ,TO_CHAR(AR.FRST_PRMISN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_PRMISN_DT ,TO_CHAR(AR.PRMISN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PRMISN_DT ,TO_CHAR(AR.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GR_USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(AR.GR_USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GR_USAGE_PD_TO ,AR.DOC_NO ,AR.RM ,AR.CMT ,ARP.PHOTO_SJ ,ARP.PHOTO_DESC ,ARP.FILENM_PHYSICL ,ARP.FILENM_LOGIC ,ARP.SHOT_DT FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE=B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR=B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO=B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT=B.MNG_CNT AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# ) AR LEFT JOIN ASSETS_RENT_PHOTO_F ARP ON AR.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = ARP.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND AR.MNG_YEAR=ARP.MNG_YEAR AND AND AR.MNG_NO=ARP.MNG_NO AND AR.MNG_CNT=ARP.MNG_CNT WHERE 1=1
SYSDATE BETWEEN AR.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM AND AR.GR_USAGE_PD_TO
TO_DATE(#usageDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD) BETWEEN AR.GR_USAGE_PD_FROM AND AR.GR_USAGE_PD_TO
AR.QUAY_GROUP_CD=#quayGroupCd#

SELECT GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , PHOTO.PHOTO_SJ , PHOTO.FILENM_PHYSICL , PHOTO.FILENM_LOGIC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC LEFT JOIN GIS_ASSETS_PHOTO_F PHOTO ON GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT (SELECT ENTRPSCD FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE ARD.PRT_AT_CODE=PRT_AT_CODE AND ARD.MNG_YEAR=MNG_YEAR AND ARD.MNG_NO =MNG_NO AND ARD.MNG_CNT =MNG_CNT ) ENTRPS_CD , GAM_GETENTRPSNM((SELECT ENTRPSCD FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE ARD.PRT_AT_CODE=PRT_AT_CODE AND ARD.MNG_YEAR=MNG_YEAR AND ARD.MNG_NO=MNG_NO AND ARD.MNG_CNT =MNG_CNT), '1' ) ENTRPS_NM , to_char(ARD.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_FROM, to_char(ARD.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_TO , ARD.USAGE_AR , ARD.FEE , ARD.USAGE_PURPS FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F ARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=ARD.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD=ARD.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD=ARD.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#

SELECT MAX(nvl(GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR, 0)) GIS_ASSETS_AR , SUM(nvl(ARD.USAGE_AR, 0)) TOTAL_AR , SUM(nvl(ARD.FEE, 0)) TOTAL_FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F ARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE =ARD.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD =ARD.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD =ARD.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND SYSDATE BETWEEN ARD.USAGE_PD_FROM and ARD.USAGE_PD_TO GROUP BY GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD, GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
